original_title: Le Frémissement s’envole à bras ouverts, Adieu.
overview: Like a Sonata, this animation is composed by four movements which, although independent, like a puzzle, together, form an inseparable block transcending their specificities. From an Allegro to an Adagio, extroverted, agitated and colorful at the start, introverted, refined and somber at the end.
title: Le Frémissement s’envole à bras ouverts, Adieu.
